title: Like any child
creator_credit: Gordon Glenn and Cradle Mountain Film Productions for Department of Health and Community Services Specialist Children's Services Unit and The Brotherhood of St Laurence
brief_description: Profiles a day in the professional life of two early childhood educators as they include a child with a disability in their centre. We follow their daily routine; seeing how they create a positive environment to encourage interaction between the children and how thoughtful planning enables all children to participate in the program. Accompanied by 3p. Discussion Notes and 47p. training manual entitled “Like any child: planning for children with disabilities.”
